amendment.description: To provide a sunset date for the Small Business Competitive Demonstration Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4464 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4464 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6381) To provide a sunset date for the Small Business Competitive Demonstration Program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4464 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4464 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Snowe.
